title: John Zorn - Filmworks 22 {FLAC]
description:
Filmworks XXII: The Last Supper

 One of the strangest films Zorn has ever scored (and thatÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s saying a LOT), The Last Supper is a science fiction/art film of wild imagination and style. The brainchild of French director Arno Bouchard, the film combines primal ritual with futuristic fantasy in images reminiscent of David Lynch or Alexandro Jodorowsky at their most bizarre. Drawing upon the worldÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s first musical instruments (voice and drums), Zorn has created a beautiful and powerful score that simultaneously embraces the sensual and the repellant, the dark and the light, the ancient and the modern.
